feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correct automation cron server timestamp by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14979
  • Use real Bull queues for testing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14984
  • prevent attachment column updates when importing budibase templates by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15000

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.0...3.2.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow December in cron validation by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15014
  • Csp updates by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.1...3.2.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • enable proxy buffering for calls to OIDC endpoints by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15015

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.2...3.2.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Misc fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14982
  • Remove SQS flag by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14835
  • remove CSP from dev by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15018
  • Clean enriched relationships flag by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15017
  • Split server tests out by database by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14992
  • Create JWT secret keys on boot. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14994
  • fix dnd handlers by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15021
  • Fix the NX check that looks for only affected packages when running tests in CI by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15022
  • Fix race conditions between automation test data and runs by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14967

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.3...3.2.4
